svg.text: Spiraling Fractal Storyline • Spaghetti Theory Visualization
Doug Engelbart → Jeff Raskin → Ted Nelson → Mr. McFeely's Speedy Delivery
Ben Shneiderman Direct Manipulation → Consciousness-Aware Feedback → Temporal Manipulation
Don Hopkins PSIBER Space → SimCity → NeWS → PostScript Universe → QuANTUM NeWS
Gestural Time Darts → Phone Tilt → Head Tracking → Probability Dartboards → Easlization
